titleStmt.title: Some observations made upon the Russia seed shewing its admirable virtues in curing the rickets in children / written by a doctor of physick in the countrey to Esq. Boyle at London, 1674.
titleStmt.author: Skinner, Dr.
Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.
Peachi, John, fl. 1683.
Pechey, John, 1655-1716.

notesStmt.note: Wrongly attributed to John Pechey by Surgeon General's catalogue (ser. 1) and British Museum catalgue, and to John Peachi by Wing. Attributed to Dr. Skinner by Halkelt and Laing--NUC pre-1956 imprint.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
